title: Read the project brief
description: Follow the link and read the project brief document to understand project requirements.

title: Buy groceries
description: Purchase groceries including fruits, vegetables, and household essentials.

title: Attend yoga class
description: Join the 6 PM yoga class at the local studio for relaxation and exercise.

title: Fix leaking faucet
description: Repair the leaking faucet in the kitchen to prevent water wastage.

title: Review monthly budget
description: Review income and expenses for the month and update the budget accordingly.

title: Study for the exam
description: Spend 2 hours studying for the upcoming history exam.

title: Plan summer vacation
description: Start planning for the summer vacation, including booking flights and accommodations.

title: Prepare grocery list
description: Make a list of necessary items for the upcoming week and plan the shopping.

title: Attend team meeting
description: Join the weekly team meeting to discuss project progress.

title: Exercise at the park
description: Exercise at the park for 30 minutes to stay active.
